The aim present pilot trial compare efficacy tolerability 25 mg/d new SC P 90 mg/d vaginal gel P luteal phase support ( LPS ) COH IUI cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Subcutaneous Progesterone Versus Vaginal Progesterone Gel Luteal Phase Support
DOC.detailed_description: The present randomize study conduct compare safety , effectiveness tolerability SC P ( Pleyris ; IBSA Institut Biochimique SA ) vaginal P gel ( Crinone ; Merck Serono ) LPS COH/IUI cycle . The study conduct , record report compliance principle Good Clinical Practice ( GCP ) guideline Department Obstetrics Gynecology Magna Graecia University Catanzaro .
DOC.criteria: < 38 year age either primary secondary infertility least 1 year ; body mass index 19 30 kg/m2 ; Day 2 serum FSH < 15 IU/ml ; normal serum prolactin level ; normal uterine cavity hysterosalpingography hysteroscopy . female partner previous ovarian surgery , one ovary , polycystic ovary ultrasound examination , endocrine abnormality ( i.e. , polycystic ovarian syndrome , thyroid disorder , hyperprolactinemia , hypogonadotropic hypogonadism ) , diminish ovarian reserve ( basal FSH level > 15 IU/mL ) , age > 38 year
